4.1.1.1.5. src.IOT_GUI_MeasureThicknessParameterSettings module¶

-- coding: utf-8 --

File: IOT_GUI_MeasureThicknessParameterSettings.py

Class IOT_GUI_MeasureThicknessParameterSettings

A frame (QGroupBox) for controlling the settings of the layer thickness measurement (class:IOT_OperationMeasureLayerThickness); namely; window half width and pixel column, pixel width and pixel height.

IOT stands for INAOE OCT Tools

Log:
Date Author Description
12-Dec-2018 FOE
  • Class created.
  • Added initial controls for parameters
  • Initial Sphinx documentation for the class
